title: 01_ Expanding Cards
description: Click on each image to expand and view location name

title: 02_ Progress Steps
description: Click the next or prev buttons to advance the progress bar

title: 03_ Rotating Navigation
description: Click on the page's hamburger nav button to rotate the page and reveal the navigation links

title: 04_ Hidden Search
description: Click the magnifying glass to expand the search bar

title: 05_ Blurry Loading
description: Gradually load the page with the background image slowly coming into focus

title: 06_ Scroll Animation
description: Scroll up/down to trigger the content boxes to pop in or out from the right or left

title: 07_ Split Landing Page
description: Landing page with a split screen: hover each side to expand out

title: 08_ Form Wave Animation
description: Add a smooth wave animation to the form labels when you click inside

title: 09_ Sound Board
description: Click each button to play a different sound

title: 10_ Dad Jokes
description: Generate a new dad joke at button click, fetched from a third party API

title: 11_ Event Keycodes
description: Press any keyboard key and display its value, key code, and code

title: 12_ FAQ Collapse
description: Expand/collapse FAQ boxes

title: 13_ Random Choice Picker
description: Type in a comma separated list, and on hitting Enter the app will randomly pick one of the inputted values

title: 14_ Animated Navigation
description: Expand/collapse a navigation menu with an animation effect

title: 15_ Incrementing Counter
description: Widget that counts up to your number of Twitter, YouTube, and Facebook followers

title: 16_ Drink Water
description: Keep track of how many glasses of water you've drank to reach your daily goal of 2L

title: 17_ Movie App
description: Search and display movies from TMDB via their API

title: 18_ Background Slider
description: Click the left and right arrow buttons to change the background and forefront images

title: 19_ Theme Clock
description: Real time analog and digital clock with dark/light mode toggle button

title: 20_ Button Ripple Effect
description: Click on the button to cause a ripple effect depending on where you clicked

title: 21_ Drag-N-Drop
description: Drag and drop a photo from the initial box to any of the others and view styling changes as you drag

title: 22_ Drawing App
description: Fun and simple web-based drawing app - change the pen color and size and draw away!

title: 23_ Kinetic Loader
description: Animated triangle loader with only CSS

title: 24_ Content Placeholders
description: Loading animation plays on card loading

title: 25_ Sticky Navbar
description: Navigation bar sticks to the top of the page and changes style at a scroll point on the page

title: 26_ Double Vertical Slider
description: Click the up/down arrows to vertically slide the next images and their title cards

title: 27_ Toast Notification
description: Pops up a message box notification at the bottom right of the screen on button click

title: 28_ Github Profiles
description: Search for and pull Github profile info

title: 29_ Double Heart Click
description: Double click the pic to show an emoji heart in the same position you clicked

title: 30_ Auto Text Effect
description: Effect for auto typing text to the screen, and also includes a speed control input

title: 31_ Password Generator
description: Generate a new password based on length, uppercase and lowercase characters, numbers and symbols - and be able to copy to the clipboard on button click

title: 32_ Good, Cheap, Fast Checkboxes
description: Styled and animated button sliders

title: 33_ Notes App
description: Add notes to the page and save to LocalStorage, and be able to switch between edit and view modes. Notes support mark down input

title: 34_ Animated Countdown
description: A 3-2-1 countdown timer with animation that can be used before loading a web page

title: 35_ Image Carousel
description: Image carousel that slides through automatically, but also has previous/next buttons to manually click through

title: 36_ Hoverboard
description: Color hover effect over a grid of boxes

title: 37_ Pokedex
description: Pokemon cards site with images, types, and names for each - uses the Poke API

title: 38_ Mobile Tab Navigation
description: Mobile UI with navbar to active different images

title: 39_ Password Strength Background
description: Background image gets clearer the stronger your password becomes

title: 40_ 3D Background Boxes
description: Grid of boxes with 3D effect and background image

title: 41_ Verify Account UI
description: Verify account box to input auth code

title: 42_ Live User Filter
description: Search and filter down users by name - uses data from the Random User API

title: 43_ Feedback UI Design
description: Submit satisfaction survey and display a thank you message with selected input

title: 44_ Custom Range Slider
description: Custom styled click/drag range slider

title: 45_ Netflix Mobile Navigation
description: Mobile Netflix navigation menu with multi-panel effect

title: 46_ Quiz App
description: Simple quiz app with multiple questions, and displays score at the end

title: 47_ Testimonial Box Switcher
description: Series of testimonial boxes that switch every ten seconds

title: 48_ Random Image Feed
description: Grid of randomly generated images

title: 49_ Todo List
description: Todos app saved to the browser's local storage, left click to mark as completed and right click to delete

title: 50_ Insect Catch Game
description: Try to catch all of the insects you can

title: Bonus_ Simple Timer
description: Tailwind CSS styled timer with play, pause and reset buttons
